name: Brick Crossy Road
summary:
Brick Crossy Road will take you back to the golden age of gaming.
All you need to do is to safely move the bit block waiting to cross the busy roads.
Watch out for retro cars, buses and trucks moving along busy retro highway. Just Kidding..We made everything in blocks..Retro style.
Cross the road when they pass and watch out for the next. This is very reflexive and
brain rattling as you proceed further.
